thread.title: Soap | Coronation Street - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap | Coronation Street - entertainment.ie
text: When Alya admits to Jason how difficult she is finding it to live with the guilt, Jason snaps that she might be best to just tell Gary the truth. Exactly, Jason! Save us all this misery. Although Jason then comes close to spilling all to Gary himself when the lads go on a night on the town together and end up coming to blows. Someone's going to crack eventually.... we HOPE. Meanwhile, with Johnny and Aidan out meeting a client, Carla offers a chuffed Eva her old job back at the factory. Aidan won't be happy about that, but we've no doubt he'll start to take a shining to Eva pretty soon (wink wink etc etc)
